content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I attempted to install the "arcgis" module using "pip install -U arcgis" and added the correct path to the system path using "export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages". However, I received a "No module named 'arcgis'" error when generating a river map. I tried adding the path to the module using "sys.path.append('/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/arcgis')" and "sys.path.append('/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages')", but still received the same error. I checked if the module was installed using "pip list | grep arcgis" but received no output. I then tried to install the module again using "pip install arcgis" and "conda install -c esri arcgis", but both attempts failed. I executed a shell command to install "conda" using "wget https://repo.anaconda.com/miniconda/Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh && bash Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh -b -p $HOME/miniconda && rm Miniconda3-latest-Linux-x86_64.sh && source $HOME/miniconda/etc/profile.d/conda.sh". I then executed a shell command to install "arcgis" using "conda install -c esri arcgis".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
